column1: Yateras is a municipality in the Guantánamo Province of Cuba. The municipal seat is located in the town of Palenque
column2: in the northern part of the province. Alejandro de Humboldt National Park
column3: a UNESCO World Heritage Site is partly located in this municipality.

column1: The municipality is divided into the barrios of Casimbas
column9: now seat of Manuel Tames municipality
column10: was part of Yateras until the reform of 1976.

column2: the municipality of Yateras had a population of 20
column3: 358. With a total area of 664 km2 (256 sq mi)
column4: it has a population density of 30.7/km2 (80/sq mi).
